sources.title: The Painted Stallion (1937) 12-CHAPTER CLIFFHANGER
sources.description:
12-CHAPTER SERIAL MARATHON!
Starring: Ray Corrigan, Hoot Gibson, Duncan Renaldo
Directed by: Alan James, Ray Taylor, William Witney

In the early 1820s, the former Spanish governor of Santa¬†Fe masterminded outlaw raids in the wild territory surrounding the city to disrupt a trade treaty between the United States and the new Mexican government. But his repeated attacks were thwarted by the appearance of a mysterious Rider on a Painted Stallion who issued warnings with whistling arrows. 

üçïCHAPTERSüçï
0:00       PizzaFLIX Intro
01:04     CHAPTER 1: Trail to Empire
28:31     CHAPTER 2: The Rider of the Stallion
45:38     CHAPTER 3: The Death Leap
1:03:47  CHAPTER 4: Avalanche!
1:21:05  CHAPTER 5: Volley of Death
1:37:49  CHAPTER 6: Thundering Wheels
1:55:38  CHAPTER 7: Trail Treachery
2:11:53  CHAPTER 8: The Whistling Arrow
2:28:24  CHAPTER 9: The Fatal Message
2:44:54  CHAPTER 10: Ambush
3:00:58  CHAPTER 11: Tunnel of Terror
3:16:35  CHAPTER 12: Human Targets
3:33:28  Please Subscribe!

metadata.Plot: The period is the 1820's and the first wagon train leaves Independence heading west to Santa Fe. In order to maintain his power, the ruthless Official at Santa Fe must not let them arrive and he sends out his men to stop them. The wagon train then has to endure repeated attacks but is aided by a mysterious rider that shoots singing arrows and rides a painted stallion.
metadata.Director: Alan James, Ray Taylor, William Witney
metadata.Writer: Morgan Cox, Ronald Davidson, Barry Shipman
metadata.Actors: Ray Corrigan, Hoot Gibson, LeRoy Mason
